name: Adele Caruso
what_you_do: Adele Mary Caruso is a Soul-Based Guide who blends holistic wellness, spiritual embodiment, creative expression and a whole lot of heart to help you reconnect with your truth and live with joyful intention.
who_you_serve: Adele helps others discover joy, spontaneity and authentic connection through play.
social_proof: Adele is a Board-Certified Holistic Health Coach, trained at the Institute for Integrative Nutrition in New York and certified by the American Association of Drugless Practitioners.
signature_programs: Improvisation for the Soul, Spiritual Dance, Rediscover your Inner Child
niche: holistic wellness, spiritual embodiment, creative expression
business_focus: Adele helps individuals transform their lives by reconnecting with their inner wisdom and living from a place of love, peace and playful curiosity.
